name: Soft Tabby Shoulder Bag
description:
• Smooth leather
  • Inside zip pocket
  • Snap closure, fabric lining
  • Detachable handle with 9" drop
  • Outside zip pocket
  • Detachable strap with 21 1/2" drop for shoulder or crossbody wear
  • 10 1/2" (L) x 6 1/2" (H) x 3 1/2" (W)
  • Style No. C4823

custom.c_closerLookText: Keeps its cool in every situation. Our smooth leather is buttery soft, subtly shiny and can be dressed up or dressed down.
custom.c_editorsNoteDescription: The Soft Tabby reimagines our structured take on an archival 1970s Coach design with a slouchy relaxed feel. Finished with our Signature hardware for an iconic touch, this smooth leather shoulder bag features zip pockets inside and out to organize small accessories and two detachable straps to carry by hand, style as a short shoulder bag or wear crossbody.
